commit.message:
scripted-diff: rename GetSystemTimeInSeconds to GetTimeSeconds

-BEGIN VERIFY SCRIPT-
sed -i -e 's/GetSystemTimeInSeconds/GetTimeSeconds/g' $(git grep -l GetSystemTimeInSeconds src)
-END VERIFY SCRIPT-
